# Block Quote

> NOTICE!  
> Hello **World!**

This is paragraph.

> WARNING!  
> Hello **Space!**
> > NESTED!  
> > But flatten
> > > NESTED NESTED!  
> > > But flatten

<!-- {"layout":"title-and-body"} -->


---

## Multi Paragraphs in a Block Quote

> This is the first paragraph.
>
> This is the second paragraph.
> - This is a list item.
> - This is another list item.
